name: Hello Kitty: Sweet Little Shops
summary: Help your little one have fun while building math skills with this LeapFrog Sanrio Hello Kitty Sweet Little Shops 39131 learning game, which features 3 levels and 40 quests that challenge your child to estimate, use charts and graphs and more.
